https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qaMncvJtjd3EvyawQitHguGAvAE.jpg A girl obsessed with zombies kills her boyfriend and turns him into a... you guessed it! Then a fat Japanese Jason Vorhees shows up and a love triangle ensues. Bite Me If You Love Me
